title: Test of a Single Variance
text: The observer's claim is that the standard deviation is less than six hits, which will be the alternate claim.

title: Test of a Single Variance
text: What the archer recorded in this case is assumed to be true as the observer is conducting the test to prove the archer wrong.

title: Test of a Single Variance
text: Even though we are given the population standard deviation the test using populaton variance can still follow $$H_0$$: q**2=6**2,H_a:q**2<6**2
